model.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the game (initialising, drawing, balls collision, state update, game update).

    • Method Detail

      • canPlace

        private boolean canPlace(Individual individual)
        Checks if there is no collision between an existing individual and the one being placed.
        Parameters:
        individual - The existing individual.
        Returns:
        True if there's no collision, false otherwise.

      • initialise

        public void initialise()
        Initialise the game (place individuals).

      • drawBallsOnCanvas

        private void drawBallsOnCanvas(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        Draws the individuals on the canvas, according to their colour and coordinates.
        Parameters:
        gc - The graphics context used to draw the individuals.
        See Also:
        Individual

      • makeCollision

        private void makeCollision(Individual i1,
                           Individual i2)
        Makes a collision happen between two individuals. Each individual will bounce towards the initial direction of the other one.
        Parameters:
        i1 - The first individual.
        i2 - The second individual.

      • checkHealth

        private void checkHealth(Individual i1,
                         Individual i2)
        Updates the state of the individuals when a collision happens.
        Parameters:
        i1 - The first individual.
        i2 - The second individual.

      • checkForCollision

        private void checkForCollision()
        Checks if a collision occurred between some individuals. An ArrayList is used in order to reduce the number of collision checking.

      • update

        public void update(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        Updates the game at each step.
        Parameters:
        gc - The graphics context used to draw the individuals.
        See Also:
        Individual.update(int, int, boolean)

        public int getIteration()
